name: Resume Template for new UX designer/ Product Designer from non traditional background
description:
I am a self taught UX Designer and I understand how difficult for people changing career path from non traditional background or graduates looking for their first job.


My resume is iterated, iterated and iterated so many times. I got review comments from mentors from APD list. I watched a lot blogs related to career strategy and videos related to UX field. I joined a lot of networking events, for example, Hackathon events, Deloitte and Outintech...etc This resume got hiring manager attentions! It boosts 90% chance to secure first round interviews.


I am 100% honest with you. I do not land my official UX job yet. I noticed I got rejections portfolio reviews and last rounds. I have to work on more on presentation and storytelling. I suggest we all treat our career as a product. Keep learning from errors and iterating!


If you have portfolio ready, feel free to use the resume template. You might land the job sooner than me.


Feel free to connect with me! I am happy to talk to you! :)
